Package com.github.skopylov58.retry

Interface Retry

public interface Retry
Interface to perform asynchronous retry operations on supplier that may throw an exception.

Retry.of(...) factory methods create Retry.Worker from Retry.CheckedSupplier.

Sample usage 

      CompletableFuture<Connection> futureConnection = 
      Retry.of(() -> DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql:a:b"))
      .withBackoff(...)
      .withExecutor(...)
      .retry();
